
### arrays and cache misses (3)  {.smaller}


```
int sum; int array[1024]; // 4KB array
for (int i = 8; i < 1016; i += 1) {
    int local_sum = 0;
    for (int j = i - 8; j < i + 8; j += 1) {
        local_sum += array[i] * (j - i);
    }
    sum += (local_sum - array[i]);
}

```
 

* [Assume everything but <code>array</code> is kept in registers (and the compiler does not do anything funny).]{.my-small}
* How many <i>data cache misses</i> on initially empty <em>2KB</em> direct-mapped cache with 16B cache blocks?
